text: Did you know that many surgical site infections after spinal surgery are caused by microbes already on your skin? 🤯 New research shows that the majority of bacteria causing infections were genetically matched to bacteria present before surgery. 🔬👨‍⚖️ This highlights the importance of proper skin preparation and hygiene in preventing infections. Let's work together to reduce the risk of surgical site infections and ensure a smooth recovery for patients! 💕
